item.description:
If you can't show up at the very early start time of 8:00 AM sharp, no big deal, just arrive when you can. (If there is rain, I will send a cancellation notice by 7:30 Sat. morning.)

For those who haven't been, Dugger Park (five courts) is not far from the Tufts courts and you can Google Map the address above for directions.

If attending, please RSVP so we can get a rough idea of how many courts we'll need.

NOTE: We haven't had to deal with this much due to ample court space so far but, if I have to break any ties as to who plays and who waits, an RSVP will go a long way towards playing.

If you don't know your "level," no problem.

If you do have an idea of your level though, please list it when you RSVP as it'll help us group players of similar levels on courts.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask, 'Are you with the Meetup?' and look for a guy w/ glasses and a right knee brace.
item.name: Tennis Saturday Morning at Dugger Park - Medford
